text: @realDonaldTrump @narendramodi Poor delusional POTUS. I guess somebody should explain to Mr. Trump if you can see it under a microscope it's not  invisible. We know what the coronavirus looks like there's pictures of it in all public restrooms. Oh well  maybe I'm just nitpicking. Don't ask me ask China. 8645
